version_description:
We’re rapidly improving your experience with seamlessly earning miles and claiming the rewards and benefits. Here are some of the few enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. Improve responsiveness on Reward page
2. Added micro animations throughout the app
3. Important bug fixes and performance improvements

We’re are making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. User interface improvements on Reward page
2. Improved user registration experience
3. Important bug fixes

We’re are making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. Improvements on the Accounts page
2. Improved responsiveness on Insight page
3. Improved error handling throughout the app
4. Important bug fixes

We’re are making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. Improved response time throughout the app
2. Improvements to the Milebank page
3. Improvements to the Reward page
4. Important bug fixes

We’re are making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. Improvements to the Refer Friends page
2. Important bug fixes
Bugs aren't fun. We got rid of some in this new update, so your Miles experience will be even better.

1. Improvements to the Reward Purchase experience
2. Improvements to Push Notification
3. UI improvements to the Accounts page
4. Important bug fixes

We’re making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. UI/UX improvements on Connector pages

We’re making significant improvements to your experience of seamlessly earning miles and redeeming them for exciting rewards. We’ve also made it easier for you to refer a friend to earn extra bonus miles. Here are some of the enhancements you’ll find in this latest update:
1. UI/UX improvements on Home with Insights
2. Easier access to refer a friend
3. Important bug fixes
Bugs aren’t fun. We got rid of some in this new update, so your Miles experience will be even better.
Bugs aren’t fun. We got rid of some in this new update, so your Miles experience will be even better.

We have enhanced the experience of redeeming your miles for exclusive rewards and have completely redesigned our rewards section with an improved user interface. We aimed to help better facilitate the discovery of some amazing rewards. The new design will showcase special rewards as well as highlighting “Premium", “Hot”, “Trending”, and “Popular” rewards. We will continue to make improvements to the overall reward redemption process, so stay tuned for more updates.

In addition to our rewards section update, we made changes to the trips section by providing a more clear picture of your starting destination and your end destination by using Apple Maps.

Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps keep the Miles engine driving.

Happy Earning!

iOS 13 is here and we’ve made further improvements to our app experience.
- You can continue earning miles as seamless as possible with greater accuracy across all modes of transportation
- Completely redesigned our rewards experience
- Better discoverability of “New”, “Popular”, “Hot” and “Trending” rewards
Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps keep the Miles engine driving.
Happy Earning!

*** Introducing Search!!! ***

• You asked and we delivered. Yup! Our new Search feature is out! Search for the rewards that interest you and we might just have it.
• New Rewards Sections: We have completely redesigned rewards experience for you, by categorizing rewards under different sections.
• Better discoverability: We now highlight our latest ‘New’, ‘Hot’, ‘Popular’ and ‘Trending’ rewards.
• Challenges: We have enhanced user experience to give better understanding of the progression of your challenges.
• Trips: iOS 13 is here, and we’ve made further improvements for you to continue earning miles as seamless as possible across all modes of transportation.

Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us go the extra Mile(s).

Happy Earning and Redeeming!

• UI/UX improvements: We have worked on improving our product experience by fixing bugs and providing better Rewards discoverability
• Performance improvement throughout the app
Happy Earning and Redeeming!

Introducing Miles 2.0, a fresh new look of our app!
• We bring you the best visual experience throughout our app: New icons, colors and infographics to uplift your experience discovering rewards, redeeming your earned miles, and much more.
Please let us know how your experience was! We value your feedback and it helps us give you the best experience possible.
Happy Earning and Redeeming!

*** Introducing Refer Friends 2.0! ***

Our new Refer Friends feature is out! You can invite your friends to join Miles and earn bonus miles for doing so! We look forward to you inviting more members to join the Miles family & earning more bonus miles!

Key new features include:
• You can now easily invite your friends through multiple channels and earn bonus miles when your friend signs-up.
• All the bonus miles can be used to redeem new and exciting rewards.

Love the app? Rate us!

Thank you for your reviews and feedback. We have added a number of exciting and delightful features below based on your feedback:

• Earn miles for 'Staying Home' while maintaining Social Distancing & Essential-only travel (using special promo code)
• Browse new “Hot & Trending Rewards” section to quickly explore all the hottest, trending and popular rewards
• Claim eligible monthly bonus miles based on membership tiers
• See 5 personalized rewards in the Spotlight via carousel
• Explore enhanced Trip Insights from the Home tab
• Enhancements to bring you the best visual experience throughout our app

Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us go the extra Mile(s).

Happy Earning (either traveling or staying at home) and Redeeming!
